name: Button
description: Trigger for an action in a page or form

properties.label: Interpret HTML
properties.name: allowHTML
properties.help: If you choose 'no', HTML code will be escaped instead of being interpreted. If you choose ‘Yes’, this could potentially lead to HTML injections attacks. Please take into account these risks.

properties.label: Assign before Submit
properties.help: Automatically assign the Task to the current user before the execution
properties.name: assign

properties.label: URL to call
properties.caption: Send data to this URL when the button is clicked
properties.help: URL used to perform the HTTP request when this button is clicked.
properties.name: url

properties.label: HTTP status code
properties.help: Holds the HTTP status code of the response
properties.name: responseStatusCode

properties.label: Data sent on click
properties.help: Can be used to fulfill a contract
properties.name: dataToSend
properties.showFor: properties.action.value === 'POST' || properties.action.value === 'PUT' || properties.action.value === 'Submit task' || properties.action.value ===  'Start process'

properties.label: Successful response value
properties.help: Holds the response when the request is successful
properties.name: dataFromSuccess

properties.label: Close modal on success
properties.help: Close modal when the action is successful
properties.name: closeOnSuccess
properties.showFor: ['POST', 'PUT', 'GET', 'DELETE', 'Submit task', 'Start process', 'Remove from collection', 'Add to collection', 'Open modal'].indexOf(properties.action.value) > -1

properties.label: Failed response value
properties.help: Holds the response when the request has failed
properties.name: dataFromError

properties.label: Target URL on success
properties.help: Next page to display, for applications. In the Portal, it is ignored as navigation is managed automatically
properties.name: targetUrlOnSuccess

properties.label: Collection
properties.name: collectionToModify
properties.caption: Variable of type array
properties.help: Use $collection to act on the collection of a repeated content
properties.showFor: properties.action.value === 'Remove from collection' || properties.action.value === 'Add to collection'

properties.label: Item to remove
properties.name: removeItem
properties.help: Use $item to remove the current item in a repeated collection
